state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First, it would be good if you could try to go east. Then, take a trip east. After that, attempt to move north. Then, go west. With that done, ensure that the portal inside the shower is open. And then, make an attempt to move west. Okay, and then, lift the dvd from the floor of the bedroom. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Office =- You've just shown up in an office. You can make out a stand. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Office =-0/1
next_state: -= Canteen =- You're now in a canteen. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. What's that over there? It looks like it's a freezer. The freezer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever! You make out a chair. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The chair is ordinary. However, the chair, like an empty chair, has nothing on it. There is a closed non-euclidean passageway leading north. There is an open gateway leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Canteen =-0/2

next_state: -= Cellar =- If you're wondering why everything seems so normal all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the cellar. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a cabinet. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day! There is an open passageway leading east. There is an open stone gate leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Cellar =-0/14
